name: WoolenKingdom
description:
This game was made as part of the SuSe22 "Project: How? Why? and Where's the next door?" class by Prof. Sebastian Stamm.

Game Description

Traverse the woollen kingdom, talk to woollen toys in the woollen village, discover the truth of the land. Do you dare enter the dark woollen castle? And face off the with the allmighty maker of this woollen land?

Controls

🧶  WASD to move

🧶  walk over string to collect it

🧶  left click with mouse to make dots that connect

Repository Link

Check out Woollen Kingdom's repository.

Credits

🧶  Devarya Joshi (Art, Design, Story)

🧶  Jose Maria Pardo Garavito (Code, Design, Story)

🧶  Sunaina "Sunny" Miller (Art, Code, Design, Story)

University of Europe for Applied Scieneces

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences. Supervised by: Prof. Sebastian Stamm "Project: How? Why? and Where's the next door?"  (SummerSemester 2022)
